How to make animated educational videos online?

Why do you need video greeting cards?;

Step 1

Pick an educational video template

Start making your animation by going through the template library of our educational video maker and selecting your favorite one. Each template offers hundreds of scenes separated by categories such as classroom environment, different subjects, text animations, and more. Pick and add the scenes manually, or go with the fully customizable video presets, to streamline the creation. The scenes will then be added to the editor for further personalization.

Step 2

Personalize your animation

Start making your animation by going through the template library of our educational video maker and selecting your favorite one. Each template offers hundreds of scenes separated by categories such as classroom environment, different subjects, text animations, and more. Pick and add the scenes manually, or go with the fully customizable video presets, to streamline the creation. The scenes will then be added to the editor for further personalization.

Step 3

Export and share your video

Go to the “Preview” section to see the final version of your educational video. Ensure that there are no more changes to be made in your animation. Once the video is final, export it in your preferred quality. Then, instantly share the video to digital platforms, or download it to your device.

Create, edit, and download stunning educational videos in a blink!

How can an online educational video maker benefit you?

Effortless creation process

You don’t have to be a video editing pro to create five-star videos for your school or educational project. Renderforest educational video maker simplifies the process of creating educational animations down to several clicks. Make the best of the flexible cloud-based editing tools to have an attractive video ready in no time.

All-purpose video templates

A large selection of editable templates allows you to create different types of videos while maintaining the same visual style, or adapt it to your needs. From whiteboard educational videos to 3D explainers and beyond, you can use an animated educational video maker to create captivating instructional videos for any purpose in one place.

Availability and security

Access your video projects anytime and from any device. Create, edit, and export videos on your desktop computer, laptop, tablet, or smartphone — all you need is an internet connection. Choose the audience of your video by setting it to private, or share the video via a custom link, to prevent unauthorized users from accessing your video.
